Title: Monstrosity
Writer: Vy Russell (original screen play by), Sue Dwiggins (original screen play by), Dean Dillman Jr. (original screen play by)
Actors: Marjorie Eaton, Frank Gerstle, Frank Fowler, Erika Peters
Plot: Somehow, atomic power is harnessed to transplant brains. An old woman uses this power to hire two sexy (and one homely) foreign housekeepers with the idea of transplanting her old brain into a sexy woman's.
